tool_description: Access to the official German Government company registrars via this API. Ideal for KYB purposes.
name: German Company Data
title: German Company Data

api_list.name: SQLsearch
api_list.description:
For advanced users only - run a custom SQL select statement against the database; 

A sample query is as follows;

select * from Names n 
join companies c on c.companyId = n.companyId
left join positions p on p.companyId = n.companyId
left join referenceNumbers rn on rn.companyId = n.companyId
left join addresses a on a.companyId = n.companyId
left join capital cp on cp.companyId = n.companyId
where name like 'cci Dialog%'

api_list.name: SearchbyName
api_list.description: Seach for gernan companies by name, using the % symbol as a wildcard, to obtain the company ID used in other API calls

api_list.name: CapitalByCompanyId
api_list.description: Get company financials by company id

api_list.name: PositionsByCompanyId
api_list.description: Look up company directors by company id

api_list.name: AddressByCompanyId
api_list.description: Get company registered addresses by company ID

api_list.name: ObjectivesByCompanyId
api_list.description: Receive the company objectives (i.e. purpose) in German for a given company

api_list.name: ReferenceNumbersByCompanyId
api_list.description: Look up the reference numbers of a company (court register etc.) from company ID.
